channel.title: Comments on: Benefit They’re Real Mascara

item.title: By: JCPC
item.dc:creator: JCPC
item.description: I love the basic Cover Girl mascara in the pink tube. Actually, my fav mascara of all time was the $2 a tube Wet n Wild, but nobody carries it anymore?! I've tried various expensive mascaras over the years and they always seen to flake off easily and get in my eyes? Maybe I should give this one a shot. As I get older, my eyelashes are getting shorter :-(
item.content:encoded: I love the basic Cover Girl mascara in the pink tube. Actually, my fav mascara of all time was the $2 a tube Wet n Wild, but nobody carries it anymore?! I’ve tried various expensive mascaras over the years and they always seen to flake off easily and get in my eyes? Maybe I should give this one a shot. As I get older, my eyelashes are getting shorter üôÅ

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/benefit-theyre-real-mascara/#comment-193">Liz</a>.
I haven't noticed that at all! To me, it doesn't seem any more difficult to remove than any really effective mascara. That isn't the kind of thing that bothers me anyways. You know?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Liz.

I haven’t noticed that at all! To me, it doesn’t seem any more difficult to remove than any really effective mascara. That isn’t the kind of thing that bothers me anyways. You know?

item.title: By: Liz
item.dc:creator: Liz
item.description: I had the same complaint with that mascara... So, I received the sample size from Sephora for my birthday didn't care for it and stuck I'm my makeup drawer as a "backup". I'm giving it a trial run again today..
item.content:encoded: I had the same complaint with that mascara… So, I received the sample size from Sephora for my birthday didn’t care for it and stuck I’m my makeup drawer as a “backup”. I’m giving it a trial run again today..

item.title: By: Denys
item.dc:creator: Denys
item.description: I use this mascara everyday and it's way better than anything else out there. HOWEVER, it's a BITCH to get off. I have to use baby oil, which I think is a big NO NO! But whatev.
item.content:encoded: I use this mascara everyday and it’s way better than anything else out there. HOWEVER, it’s a BITCH to get off. I have to use baby oil, which I think is a big NO NO! But whatev.
